title: Nike Files to Sell Digital Sneakers, as It Seeks Downloadable Kicks
sub_head: Sneaker company’s trademark applications indicate it wants to offer virtual goods as part of videogames and other online platforms
body:
Nike Inc. might soon sell you sneakers that can’t be worn.
The company filed trademark applications last week that indicate it wants to sell digital versions of its sneakers, clothing and other goods stamped with its swoosh logo in virtual worlds, such as videogames or other online platforms.
